scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/login.js -o build/login.js && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/main.js -o build/main.js && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/select_favorites.js -o build/select_favorites.js && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/my_page.js -o build/my_page.js
scripts.build_login: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/login.js -o build/login.js
scripts.build_main: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/main.js -o build/main.js
scripts.build_sf: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/select_favorites.js -o build/select_favorites.js
scripts.build_mp: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/my_page.js -o build/my_page.js
